title: mx12.levins
author: mx12.levins
created_time: November 18, 2023, 05:37:32 PMLast edit: April 02, 2024, 09:06:22 PM by mx12.levins
content: Hello Bitcointalk community member and Bitcoin art collector The bitcoin artist who never gives up, made this for you I have one of my very early artworks where I depict myself as a creature.Some may see it as just another monster, but certain life events can turn your world upside down in 360 degrees.This voiceless artwork is one of my favorites in my entire collection.There's more to it than meets the eye – there's a symbolism related to bitcointhat may surprise you.____________________________**VOICELESS**https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5406363.msg60569801#msg60569801____________________________None of the artworks from this collection have been sold so far, which is good news for those looking for Bitcoin OG artists.There's much more to discover about this creature, - a lot of exciting content is on the way!Moving forward, let me introduce you to another artwork from this collection –a new character in space who has just broken out of the canister.Bitcoin Phantom!if the price ticker is not loading then update the link BTC= + (US 50$ Shipping ) + (EU 15$ Shipping)Physical artwork in size 40,9 x 40,9 cmCollectors Edition 12 of 12Bitcoin Phantom1. - “Bitcoin Phantom” --- SOLD2. - “Bitcoin Phantom” --- AVAILABLE3. - “Bitcoin Phantom” --- AVAILABLE4. - “Bitcoin Phantom” --- AVAILABLE5. - “Bitcoin Phantom” --- AVAILABLE6. - “Bitcoin Phantom” --- AVAILABLE7. - “Bitcoin Phantom” --- AVAILABLE8. - “Bitcoin Phantom” --- AVAILABLE9. - “Bitcoin Phantom” --- AVAILABLE10. - “Bitcoin Phantom” --- AVAILABLE11. - “Bitcoin Phantom” --- AVAILABLE12. - “Bitcoin Phantom” --- AVAILABLEEach Collector’s Edition is hand-signed and numbered by Mx12ArtPayment:Payment address Bitcoin: 3CDxDhHppj1Vyjfb771WjUNiS28UvR5EZyPayment address Bitcoin Lightning: nastyrisk78@walletofsatoshi.comBitcoin PhantomWhen Bitcoin fees get high, the Bitcoin Phantom steps in. His job?Helping folks against the Fiat Monster, a creature trying to stop Bitcoin.The Phantom guides people through the bitcoin world,protecting them from the Fiat Monster's tricks.As fees rise, the Phantom appears to teach users about the importance of their digital money.The Fiat Monster doesn't like this and tries to put the Phantom back in the canister of ignorance.But the Phantom keeps helping, showing people how to break free from traditional money.In this ongoing story,the Bitcoin Phantom is a symbol of knowledge and freedom,fighting against the fiat forces that want to hold backthe rise of decentralized currency._____________________________Feel Free to visit Mx12.Art Bitcoin Art Threadhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5362071.0 BTC

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: I can't believe this artwork is still available. Sometimes, I create pieces that amaze even myself. It's astonishing how I can produce such varied styles, yet they still feel interconnected. And then there are the memories each artwork holds, they're like snapshots of my life. That's why I enjoy revisiting my art, picking them up one by one, lest I forget. It's a challenge I must face living with brain damage, the memories don't always end well.
